data.actual_result: Message gose red and dosent send, clyde says the user block you message
data.expected_result: It just has the "You dont have perms" thing on message bar and you cant even type anything and Clyde says the correct message
data.short_description: Being active in a channel where you require a role to be in causes Clyde to give the wrong message when you send a message
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a role that has access to a channel that cant be access without it - go into said channel - get role removed - type a message and hit send
